publication.jconf: Industrial and Engineering Applications of Artificial Intelligence and Expert Systems
publication.keyword: Fault Diagnosis;Knowledge Base;Knowledge Engineering;Switched System;System Architecture;Expert System;
publication.abstract: For the maintenance of a switching system, many levels of expert's decisions may be required to find a correct cause and its appropriate repair procedure. Output messages generated by our switching system, called TDX-1A, for the maintenances have, in general, the following characteristics:A bunch of maintenance messages generated only by even not many trouble/faults make it hard for an operator

Integrating admission control and packet scheduling for quality controlled streaming services in HSDPA networks
publication.authors: joseph s. gomes,hyeong-ah choi,jungkyo sohn,hyeong in choi
publication.keyword: Admission Control;Cellular Network;High Speed;hybrid arq;Link Adaptation;Network Simulator;Opportunistic Scheduling;Packet Scheduling;Proportional Fair;qos guarantee;Scheduling Algorithm;Service Operation;User Satisfaction;Base Station;High Speed Downlink Packet Access;Multi User Diversity;Radio Network Controller;
publication.abstract: High-Speed Downlink Packet Access (HSDPA) uses a shared forward link packet data channel that can achieve peak data rates upto 14.4 Mbps. The newly introduced features that are key to reaching such high rates are link adaptation, Hybrid ARQ (HARQ) and fast scheduling. The decision to admit new users is still taken by the Radio Network Controller (RNC); however the

publication.title: Policy-Based QoS-Aware Packet Scheduling for CDMA 1x Ev-DO
publication.authors: jinho hwang,m. tamer refaei,hyeong-ah choi,jungkyo sohn,hyeong in choi
publication.keyword: Fair Allocation;Opportunistic Scheduling;Packet Scheduling;Packet Scheduling Algorithm;Policy Rules;Quality of Service;Scheduling Algorithm;Utility Function;High Data Rate;
publication.abstract: CDMA 1x Ev-DO is an evolution of the CDMA2000 3G wireless standard to enable high rate packet data services up to 2.4Mbps in Rev 0, 3.1Mbps in Rev A, and 4.9Mbps in Rev B. To support such high data rates, CDMA 1x Ev-DO utilizes TDMA technology on the downlink allowing a single receiver per time slot. Accordingly, a scheduling algorithm

publication.abstract: User-generated content (UGC) also known as user- created content (UCC) refers to various kinds of media contents that are produced by end users. A recent trend in the use of the Internet exhibits that data traffic from UGC is rapidly growing with the potential to create a huge amount of uplink traffic for wireless operators. publication.keyword: Data Transfer;High Speed;Multimedia Services;Opportunistic Scheduling;Scheduling Algorithm;Service Operation;System Performance;Best Effort;High Data Rate;High Speed Downlink Packet Access;Multi User Diversity;
publication.abstract: Increasing demand for high data-rate multimedia services has led to the emergence of high-speed data transfer features such as High-Speed Downlink Packet Access (HSDPA) for WCDMA networks. The role of the MAC-hs scheduler is vital in HSDPA in improving overall system performance.
